1520000.name: Ragdoll Game
1520000.description:
Ragdoll Game is a 10-player physics-based party game packed with diverse and exciting game modes to keep the fun going! Compete with friends or meet new players by jumping into public lobbies through the handy lobby browser.

Express your individuality by customizing your character with unique items earned through gameplay, which are added to your Steam Inventory. Show off your unique character design while navigating through challenges, whether competing solo or sharing the chaos with others in multiplayer matches!

  • Box Run - a thrilling battle to be the last one standing as players push each other off disappearing boxes on a crumbling map.

  • Don't Fall From The Platform (DFFTP) - a high-stakes survival challenge where quick jumps and sharp reflexes help players outlast others on platforms that vanish every few seconds.

  • Bomb Tag - a nerve-wracking chase where players must pass a ticking bomb to others before time runs out, dodging disaster to be the last one standing.

  • King Of The Point - a chaotic free-for-all where players earn points by holding their ground on a designated spot while battling to push others off, with the highest scorer claiming victory

  • Speedrun - a race against time through a challenging parkour course, where speed and agility determine who claims the fastest finish.

  • Maze Escape - a race through a procedurally generated labyrinth where players navigate twists, turns, and dead ends to be the first to reach the exit.

  • More modes to come in later stages of the game
1520000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
